trans-unit.source: Exposes the public members of the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> class to unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 公開 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> 類別的公用成員至 Unmanaged 程式碼。

trans-unit.source: This interface is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此介面會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，而且不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: This interface preserves the vtable order of the <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo?displayProperty=nameWithType> class members that can be accessed by unmanaged COM objects.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面會保留 vtable 順序的<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo?displayProperty=nameWithType>類別可由 unmanaged COM 物件存取的成員。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.Attributes" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.Attributes" /> 屬性之存取權。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldAttributes" /> for this field.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldAttributes" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.Attributes%2A> property gets the attributes associated with this field.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.Attributes%2A>屬性會取得與這個欄位相關聯的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.DeclaringType" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.DeclaringType" /> 屬性之存取權。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object for the class that declares this member.
trans-unit.target: 宣告這個成員之類別的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.DeclaringType%2A> property gets the class that declares this member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.DeclaringType%2A>屬性會取得宣告此成員的類別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 與目前的 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 相比較的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Object.Equals(System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="M:System.Object.Equals(System.Object)" /> 方法之存取權。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Object" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Object" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 和目前的 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 相等，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A> method determines whether the specified <xref:System.Object> is equal to the current <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>方法會判斷是否指定<xref:System.Object>是否等於目前<xref:System.Object>。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.FieldHandle" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.FieldHandle" /> 屬性之存取權。

trans-unit.source: A handle to the internal metadata representation of a field.
trans-unit.target: 欄位內部中繼資料表示的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.FieldHandle%2A> property gets a <xref:System.RuntimeFieldHandle>, which is a handle to the internal metadata representation of a field.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.FieldHandle%2A>屬性會取得<xref:System.RuntimeFieldHandle>，這是一個欄位的內部中繼資料表示法的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.FieldType" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.FieldType" /> 屬性之存取權。

trans-unit.source: The type of this field object.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位物件的型別。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.FieldType%2A> property gets the type of this field object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.FieldType%2A>屬性會取得這個欄位物件的類型。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="Overload:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes" /> methods.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="Overload:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes" /> 方法之存取權。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A> methods return all attributes applied to this member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A>方法會傳回所有套用至這個成員的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to search this member's inheritance chain to find the attributes.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否要搜尋這個成員的繼承鏈結以尋找屬性。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes(System.Boolean)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes(System.Boolean)" /> 方法之存取權。

trans-unit.source: An array that contains all the custom attributes, or an array with zero elements if no attributes are defined.
trans-unit.target: 包含所有自訂屬性的陣列，如果沒有定義屬性，則為包含零元素的陣列。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A> method returns an array containing all the custom attributes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A>方法會傳回陣列，其中包含的所有自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: The type of attribute to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的屬性類型。

trans-unit.source: Only attributes that are assignable to this type are returned.
trans-unit.target: 只會傳回可指派給這種類型的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to search this member's inheritance chain to find the attributes.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否要搜尋這個成員的繼承鏈結以尋找屬性。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes(System.Type,System.Boolean)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes(System.Type,System.Boolean)" /> 方法之存取權。

trans-unit.source: An array of custom attributes applied to this member, or an array with zero (0) elements if no attributes have been applied.
trans-unit.target: 套用至這個成員的自訂屬性陣列，如果沒有套用屬性，則為包含零 (0) 元素的陣列。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A> method returns an array of custom attributes identified by <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A>方法會傳回所識別的自訂屬性陣列<xref:System.Type>。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Object.GetHashCode" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="M:System.Object.GetHashCode" /> 方法之存取權。

trans-unit.source: The hash code for the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 目前執行個體的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A> method serves as a hash function for a particular type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A>方法做為特定類型的雜湊函式。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A> is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures like a hash table.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A> 適用於雜湊演算法和雜湊資料表這類的資料結構。

trans-unit.source: Reserved for future use.
trans-unit.target: 保留供未來使用。

trans-unit.source: Must be IID_NULL.
trans-unit.target: 必須是 IID_NULL。

trans-unit.source: Passed-in array of names to be mapped.
trans-unit.target: 要對應之傳入的名稱陣列。

trans-unit.source: Count of the names to be mapped.
trans-unit.target: 要對應的名稱計數。

trans-unit.source: The locale context in which to interpret the names.
trans-unit.target: 用於解譯名稱的地區設定內容。

trans-unit.source: Caller-allocated array that receives the IDs corresponding to the names.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端配置的陣列，用於接收對應於名稱的 ID。

trans-unit.source: Maps a set of names to a corresponding set of dispatch identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 將一組名稱對應至一組對應的分派識別項 (Dispatch Identifier)。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Object.GetType" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="M:System.Object.GetType" /> 方法之存取權。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object.GetType%2A> method gets the type of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.GetType%2A>方法會取得目前的執行個體的類型。

trans-unit.source: The type information to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回的類型資訊。

trans-unit.source: The locale identifier for the type information.
trans-unit.target: 類型資訊的地區設定識別項。

trans-unit.source: Receives a pointer to the requested type information object.
trans-unit.target: 接收要求的類型資訊物件的指標。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the type information for an object, which can then be used to get the type information for an interface.
trans-unit.target: 擷取物件的類型資訊，可以用來取得介面的類型資訊。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IDispatch::GetTypeInfo`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`IDispatch::GetTypeInfo`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: Points to a location that receives the number of type information interfaces provided by the object.
trans-unit.target: 指向接收物件提供的類型資訊介面數目的位置。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the number of type information interfaces that an object provides (either 0 or 1).
trans-unit.target: 擷取物件提供的類型資訊介面數目 (0 或 1)。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IDispatch::GetTypeInfoCount`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`IDispatch::GetTypeInfoCount`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: The object whose field value will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 將傳回其欄位值的物件。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.GetValue(System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.GetValue(System.Object)" /> 方法之存取權。

trans-unit.source: An object containing the value of the field reflected by this instance.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含這個執行個體所反映欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.GetValue%2A> method returns the value of a field supported by a given object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.GetValue%2A>方法會傳回指定物件所支援的欄位值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TypedReference" /> structure that encapsulates a managed pointer to a location and a runtime representation of the type that might be stored at that location.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.TypedReference" /> 結構，其封裝位置的 Managed 指標和可能儲存在該位置之型別的執行階段表示。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.GetValueDirect(System.TypedReference)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.GetValueDirect(System.TypedReference)" /> 方法之存取權。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> containing a field value.
trans-unit.target: 含有欄位值的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.GetValueDirect%2A> method returns the value of a field supported by a given object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.GetValueDirect%2A>方法會傳回指定物件所支援的欄位值。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the member.
trans-unit.target: 辨識成員。

trans-unit.source: Reserved for future use.
trans-unit.target: 保留供未來使用。

trans-unit.source: Must be IID_NULL.
trans-unit.target: 必須是 IID_NULL。

trans-unit.source: The locale context in which to interpret arguments.
trans-unit.target: 地區設定內容，用於解譯引數。

trans-unit.source: Flags describing the context of the call.
trans-unit.target: 描述呼叫之內容的旗標。

trans-unit.source: Pointer to a structure containing an array of arguments, an array of argument DISPIDs for named arguments, and counts for the number of elements in the arrays.
trans-unit.target: 結構的指標，此結構包含引數陣列、指名引數之 DISPID 引數的陣列，以及陣列中項目數目的計數。

trans-unit.source: Pointer to the location where the result is to be stored.
trans-unit.target: 指向用於儲存結果之位置的指標。

trans-unit.source: Pointer to a structure that contains exception information.
trans-unit.target: 包含例外狀況資訊的結構指標。

trans-unit.source: The index of the first argument that has an error.
trans-unit.target: 第一個有錯誤的引數索引。

trans-unit.source: Provides access to properties and methods exposed by an object.
trans-unit.target: 提供物件所公開的屬性和方法的存取權。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IDispatch::Invoke`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`IDispatch::Invoke`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsAssembly" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsAssembly" /> 屬性之存取權。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the field has the <see langword="Assembly" /> attribute set; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果欄位已設定 <see langword="true" /> 屬性，則為 <see langword="Assembly" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsAssembly%2A> property gets a value indicating whether this field has `Assembly` level visibility.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsAssembly%2A>屬性會取得值，指出這個欄位是否具有`Assembly`層級的可見性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object to which the custom attributes are applied.
trans-unit.target: 套用自訂屬性的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to search this member's inheritance chain to find the attributes.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否要搜尋這個成員的繼承鏈結以尋找屬性。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.IsDefined(System.Type,System.Boolean)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.IsDefined(System.Type,System.Boolean)" /> 方法之存取權。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if one or more instance of <paramref name="attributeType" /> is applied to this member; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果一或多個 <paramref name="attributeType" /> 的執行個體套用至這個成員，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.IsDefined%2A> method indicates whether one or more instance of `attributeType` is applied to this member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.IsDefined%2A>方法會指出是否有一個或多個執行個體`attributeType`套用至這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsFamily" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsFamily" /> 屬性之存取權。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the field has the <see langword="Family" /> attribute set; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果欄位已設定 <see langword="true" /> 屬性，則為 <see langword="Family" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsFamily%2A> property gets a value indicating whether this field has `Family` level visibility.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsFamily%2A>屬性會取得值，指出這個欄位是否具有`Family`層級的可見性。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsFamilyAndAssembly" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsFamilyAndAssembly" /> 屬性之存取權。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the field has the <see langword="FamANDAssem" /> attribute set; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果欄位已設定 <see langword="true" /> 屬性，則為 <see langword="FamANDAssem" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsFamilyAndAssembly%2A> property gets a value indicating whether this field has `FamilyAndAssembly` level visibility.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsFamilyAndAssembly%2A>屬性會取得值，指出這個欄位是否具有`FamilyAndAssembly`層級的可見性。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsFamilyOrAssembly" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsFamilyOrAssembly" /> 屬性之存取權。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the field has the <see langword="FamORAssem" /> attribute set; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果欄位已設定 <see langword="true" /> 屬性，則為 <see langword="FamORAssem" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsFamilyOrAssembly%2A> property gets a value indicating whether this field has `FamilyOrAssembly` level visibility.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsFamilyOrAssembly%2A>屬性會取得值，指出這個欄位是否具有`FamilyOrAssembly`層級的可見性。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsInitOnly" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsInitOnly" /> 屬性之存取權。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the field has the <see langword="InitOnly" /> attribute set; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果欄位已設定 <see langword="true" /> 屬性，則為 <see langword="InitOnly" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsInitOnly%2A> property gets a value indicating whether the field can only be set in the body of the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsInitOnly%2A>屬性會取得值，指出是否可以只在建構函式主體中設定欄位。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsLiteral" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsLiteral" /> 屬性之存取權。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the field has the <see langword="Literal" /> attribute set; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果欄位已設定 <see langword="true" /> 屬性，則為 <see langword="Literal" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsLiteral%2A> property gets a value indicating whether the value is written at compile time and cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsLiteral%2A>屬性會取得值，指出值是否會在編譯時期寫入，且無法變更。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsNotSerialized" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsNotSerialized" /> 屬性之存取權。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the field has the <see langword="NotSerialized" /> attribute set; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果欄位已設定 <see langword="true" /> 屬性，則為 <see langword="NotSerialized" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsNotSerialized%2A> property gets a value indicating whether this field has the `NotSerialized` attribute.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsNotSerialized%2A>屬性會取得值，指出這個欄位是否具有`NotSerialized`屬性。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsPinvokeImpl" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsPinvokeImpl" /> 屬性之存取權。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see langword="PinvokeImpl" /> attribute is set in <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldAttributes" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldAttributes" /> 中設定 <see langword="true" /> 屬性，則為 <see langword="PinvokeImpl" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsPinvokeImpl%2A> property gets a value indicating whether the corresponding `PinvokeImpl` attribute is set in <xref:System.Reflection.FieldAttributes>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsPinvokeImpl%2A>屬性會取得值，指出是否對應`PinvokeImpl`設定屬性<xref:System.Reflection.FieldAttributes>。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsPrivate" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsPrivate" /> 屬性之存取權。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the field is private; otherwise; <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果欄位是私用的，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsPrivate%2A> property gets a value indicating whether the field is private.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsPrivate%2A>屬性會取得值，指出是否為私用欄位。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsPublic" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsPublic" /> 屬性之存取權。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this field is public; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果欄位是公用的，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsPublic%2A> property gets a value indicating whether the field is public.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsPublic%2A>屬性會取得值，指出欄位是否為公用。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsSpecialName" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsSpecialName" /> 屬性之存取權。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see langword="SpecialName" /> attribute is set in <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldAttributes" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldAttributes" /> 中設定 <see langword="true" /> 屬性，則為 <see langword="SpecialName" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsSpecialName%2A> property gets a value indicating whether the corresponding `SpecialName` attribute is set in the <xref:System.Reflection.FieldAttributes> enumerator.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsSpecialName%2A>屬性會取得值，指出是否對應`SpecialName`設定屬性<xref:System.Reflection.FieldAttributes>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsStatic" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsStatic" /> 屬性之存取權。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this field is static; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果欄位是靜態的，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsStatic%2A> property gets a value indicating whether the field is static.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.IsStatic%2A>屬性會取得值，指出欄位是否為靜態。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.MemberType" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.MemberType" /> 屬性之存取權。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberTypes" /> value indicating that this member is a field.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberTypes" /> 值，表示這個成員為欄位。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.MemberType%2A> property gets a <xref:System.Reflection.MemberTypes> value indicating that this member is a field.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.MemberType%2A>屬性會取得<xref:System.Reflection.MemberTypes>值，指出這個成員欄位。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.Name" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.Name" /> 屬性之存取權。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the name of this member.
trans-unit.target: 含有這個成員名稱的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.Name%2A> property gets the name of the current member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.Name%2A>屬性會取得目前成員的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.ReflectedType" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.ReflectedType" /> 屬性之存取權。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object through which this object was obtained.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 物件，用來取得這個物件。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.ReflectedType%2A> property gets the class object that was used to obtain this instance of <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.ReflectedType%2A>屬性取得用來取得這個執行個體的類別物件<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="Overload:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.SetValue" /> methods.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="Overload:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.SetValue" /> 方法之存取權。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.SetValue%2A> methods set the value of the field for the given object to the given value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.SetValue%2A>方法會將指定的物件欄位的值設為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The object whose field value will be set.
trans-unit.target: 將設定其欄位值的物件。

trans-unit.source: The value to assign to the field.
trans-unit.target: 要指派給欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.SetValue(System.Object,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.SetValue(System.Object,System.Object)" /> 方法之存取權。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.SetValue%2A> method sets the value of the field supported by the given object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.SetValue%2A>方法設定的給定物件所支援的欄位值。

trans-unit.source: The object whose field value will be set.
trans-unit.target: 將設定其欄位值的物件。

trans-unit.source: The value to assign to the field.
trans-unit.target: 要指派給欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: A field of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" /> that specifies the type of binding that is desired (for example, <see langword="Binder.CreateInstance" /> or <see langword="Binder.ExactBinding" />).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" /> 的欄位，指定想要繫結的型別 (例如，<see langword="Binder.CreateInstance" /> 或 <see langword="Binder.ExactBinding" /> )。

trans-unit.source: A set of properties that enables the binding, coercion of argument types, and invocation of members through reflection.
trans-unit.target: 透過反映來啟用繫結、強制引數型別和成員引動過程的一組屬性。

trans-unit.source: If <c>binder</c> is <see langword="null" />, then <see langword="Binder.DefaultBinding" /> is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果「繫結器」<c></c>是 <see langword="null" />，則會使用 <see langword="Binder.DefaultBinding" />。

trans-unit.source: The software preferences of a particular culture.
trans-unit.target: 特定文化特性 (Culture) 的軟體喜好設定。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.SetValue(System.Object,System.Object,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.SetValue(System.Object,System.Object,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo)" /> 方法之存取權。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.SetValue%2A> method sets the value of the field supported by the given object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.SetValue%2A>方法設定的給定物件所支援的欄位值。

trans-unit.source: The object whose field value will be set.
trans-unit.target: 將設定其欄位值的物件。

trans-unit.source: The value to assign to the field.
trans-unit.target: 要指派給欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.SetValueDirect(System.TypedReference,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.SetValueDirect(System.TypedReference,System.Object)" /> 方法之存取權。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.SetValueDirect%2A> method sets the value of the field supported by the given object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo.SetValueDirect%2A>方法設定的給定物件所支援的欄位值。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Object.ToString" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="M:System.Object.ToString" /> 方法之存取權。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 字串，代表目前的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。
